cards.name: Herald of Anafenza
cards.text:
Outlast {2}{W} ({2}{W}, {T}: Put a +1/+1 counter on this creature. Outlast only as a sorcery.)
Whenever you activate Herald of Anafenza's outlast ability, create a 1/1 white Warrior creature token.

rulings.text: The Warrior token is created before the +1/+1 counter is put on Herald of Anafenza.

The cost to activate a creature’s outlast ability includes the tap symbol ({T}). A creature’s outlast ability can’t be activated unless that creature has been under your control continuously since the beginning of your turn.

Several creatures with outlast also grant an ability to creatures you control with +1/+1 counters on them, including themselves. These counters could come from an outlast ability, but any +1/+1 counter on the creature will count.

foreignNames.name: Heroldin der Anafenza
foreignNames.text:

cards.flavor: Discipline is the first pillar of the Jeskai Way. Each member of the clan trains in a weapon, perfecting its use over a lifetime.

rulings.text: Any spell you cast that doesn’t have the type creature will cause prowess to trigger. If a spell has multiple types, and one of those types is creature (such as an artifact creature), casting it won’t cause prowess to trigger. Playing a land also won’t cause prowess to trigger.
Prowess goes on the stack on top of the spell that caused it to trigger. It will resolve before that spell.
Once it triggers, prowess isn’t connected to the spell that caused it to trigger. If that spell is countered, prowess will still resolve.

cards.name: Master of Pearls
cards.text:
Morph {3}{W}{W} (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.)
When Master of Pearls is turned face up, creatures you control get +2/+2 until end of turn.

rulings.text: Any time you have priority, you may turn the face-down creature face up by revealing what its morph cost is and paying that cost. This is a special action. It doesn’t use the stack and can’t be responded to. Only a face-down permanent can be turned face up this way; a face-down spell cannot.
Because the permanent is on the battlefield both before and after it’s turned face up, turning a permanent face up doesn’t cause any enters-the-battlefield abilities to trigger.

A permanent that turns face up or face down changes characteristics but is otherwise the same permanent. Spells and abilities that were targeting that permanent, as well as Auras and Equipment that were attached to the permanent, aren’t affected.
At any time, you can look at a face-down spell or permanent you control. You can’t look at face-down spells or permanents you don’t control unless an effect instructs you to do so.

You must ensure that your face-down spells and permanents can easily be differentiated from each other. You’re not allowed to mix up the cards that represent them on the battlefield in order to confuse other players. The order they entered the battlefield should remain clear. Common methods for doing this include using markers or dice, or simply placing them in order on the battlefield.
If a face-down permanent leaves the battlefield, you must reveal it. You must also reveal all face-down spells and permanents you control if you leave the game or if the game ends.
Morph lets you cast a card face down by paying {3}, and lets you turn the face-down permanent face up any time you have priority by paying its morph cost.

The face-down spell has no mana cost and has a converted mana cost of 0. When you cast a face-down spell, put it on the stack face down so no other player knows what it is, and pay {3}. This is an alternative cost.

When the spell resolves, it enters the battlefield as a 2/2 creature with no name, mana cost, creature types, or abilities. It’s colorless and has a converted mana cost of 0. Other effects that apply to the creature can still grant it any of these characteristics.

rulings.text: Any spell you cast that doesn’t have the type creature will cause prowess to trigger. If a spell has multiple types, and one of those types is creature (such as an artifact creature), casting it won’t cause prowess to trigger. Playing a land also won’t cause prowess to trigger.
Prowess goes on the stack on top of the spell that caused it to trigger. It will resolve before that spell.
Once it triggers, prowess isn’t connected to the spell that caused it to trigger. If that spell is countered, prowess will still resolve.
Multiple instances of lifelink on the same creature are redundant.

cards.name: Suspension Field
cards.text: When Suspension Field enters the battlefield, you may exile target creature with toughness 3 or greater until Suspension Field leaves the battlefield. (That creature returns under its owner's control.)

rulings.text: Suspension Field’s ability causes a zone change with a duration. It’s a single ability that creates two one-shot effects: one that exiles the creature when the ability resolves, and another that returns the exiled card to the battlefield immediately after Suspension Field leaves the battlefield.

If the target creature becomes an illegal target before the ability resolves, perhaps because its toughness was lowered, the ability won’t resolve and none of its effects will happen. No creature will be exiled, and Suspension Field will remain on the battlefield.
If Suspension Field leaves the battlefield before its enters-the-battlefield ability resolves, the target creature won’t be exiled.

Auras attached to the exiled creature will be put into their owners’ graveyards. Equipment attached to the exiled creature will become unattached and remain on the battlefield. Any counters on the exiled creature will cease to exist.
If a token is exiled this way, it ceases to exist. It won’t be returned to the battlefield.

The exiled card returns to the battlefield immediately after Suspension Field leaves the battlefield. Nothing happens between these two events, including state-based actions. Suspension Field and the returned card aren’t on the battlefield at the same time.

In a multiplayer game, if Suspension Field’s owner leaves the game, the exiled card will return to the battlefield. Because the one-shot effect that returns the card isn’t an ability that goes on the stack, it won’t cease to exist along with the leaving player’s spells and abilities on the stack.

cards.name: Timely Hordemate
cards.text: Raid — When Timely Hordemate enters the battlefield, if you attacked this turn, return target creature card with mana value 2 or less from your graveyard to the battlefield.

rulings.text: Raid abilities care only that you attacked with a creature. It doesn’t matter how many creatures you attacked with, or which opponent or planeswalker controlled by an opponent those creatures attacked.

Raid abilities evaluate the entire turn to see if you attacked with a creature. That creature doesn’t have to still be on the battlefield. Similarly, the player or planeswalker it attacked doesn’t have to still be in the game or on the battlefield, respectively.

foreignNames.text: 습격 — 적시에 등장한 부족지기가 전장에 들어올 때, 당신이 이 턴에 생물로 공격했다면, 당신의 무덤에 있는 전환마나비용이 2 이하인 생물 카드를 목표로 정한다. 그 카드를 전장으로 되돌린다.

foreignNames.name: Companheiro de Horda Oportuno
foreignNames.text: Raide — Quando Companheiro de Horda Oportuno entra no campo de batalha, se você atacou com uma criatura neste turno, devolva o card de criatura alvo com custo de mana convertido igual ou inferior a 2 do seu cemitério para o campo de batalha.

foreignNames.name: Подоспевший Соратник
foreignNames.text: Набег — Когда Подоспевший Соратник выходит на поле битвы, если в этом ходу вы атаковали существом, верните целевую карту существа с конвертированной мана-стоимостью не более 2 из вашего кладбища на поле битвы.

foreignNames.name: 驰援族伴
foreignNames.text: 突击～当驰援族伴进战场时，若你于本回合中曾以生物攻击，则将目标总法术力费用等于或小于2的生物牌从你的坟墓场移回战场。

foreignNames.name: 馳援族伴
foreignNames.text: 突擊～當馳援族伴進戰場時，若你於本回合中曾以生物攻擊，則將目標總魔法力費用等於或小於2的生物牌從你的墳墓場移回戰場。

cards.originalText: Raid — When Timely Hordemate enters the battlefield, if you attacked with a creature this turn, return target creature card with converted mana cost 2 or less from your graveyard to the battlefield.

cards.name: Venerable Lammasu
cards.text: Flying
cards.flavor: Lammasu are the enigmatic travelers of Tarkir, soaring high above all lands in all seasons. None know their true purpose, but they often arrive on the eve of great conflicts or turning points in history.

foreignNames.name: Ehrwürdiger Lammasu
foreignNames.text: Fliegend
foreignNames.flavor: Lammasu sind die rätselhaften Reisenden von Tarkir: Hoch in den Lüften segeln sie zu allen Jahreszeiten über das Land. Keiner kennt ihre wahre Absicht, doch oft erscheinen sie am Vorabend eines großen Konflikts oder an Wendepunkten der Geschichte.

foreignNames.name: Lammasu venerable
foreignNames.text: Vuela.
foreignNames.flavor: Los lammasu son los enigmáticos viajeros de Tarkir que sobrevuelan todas las tierras en todas las estaciones. Nadie conoce su auténtico propósito, pero a menudo llegan en la víspera de grandes conflictos o puntos de inflexión de la historia.

foreignNames.name: Lamassu vénérable
foreignNames.text: Vol
foreignNames.flavor: Les lamassus sont des voyageurs énigmatiques de Tarkir, planant au-dessus des terres en toute saison. Nul ne connaît leur véritable raison d'être, mais ils apparaissent souvent à la veille de grands conflits, ou de moments décisifs de l'histoire.

foreignNames.name: Lammasu Venerabile
foreignNames.text: Volare
foreignNames.flavor: I lammasu, enigmatici viaggiatori di Tarkir, si librano alti sopra tutte le regioni in qualsiasi stagione. Nessuno ne conosce i veri scopi, ma giungono spesso alla vigilia di grandi battaglie o di momenti storici cruciali.

foreignNames.name: 尊いラマスー
foreignNames.text: 飛行
foreignNames.type: クリーチャー — ラマスー
foreignNames.flavor: ラマスーは季節を通してタルキール全土の遥か上空を舞う、謎多きタルキールの放浪者である。彼らの真の目的を知る者は誰もいないが、大いなる戦乱や歴史の転換点の前にしばしば出現していると言われている。

foreignNames.name: 존경받는 라마수
foreignNames.text: 비행
foreignNames.flavor: 라마수는 사계절 내내 대지 위를 비행하는 타르커의 신비한 여행자다. 라마수의 진정한 목적은 아무도 모르지만, 주로 큰 전투나 역사적인 전환점의 전야에 나타난다.

foreignNames.name: Lammasu Venerável
foreignNames.text: Voar
foreignNames.flavor: Os lammasu são viajantes enigmáticos de Tarkir, que sobrevoam todas as terras em todas as estações. Ninguém conhece seu verdadeiro propósito, mas eles costumam chegar às vésperas de grandes conflitos ou em momentos decisivos da história.

foreignNames.name: Почитаемый Ламмасу
foreignNames.text: Полет
foreignNames.flavor: Ламмасу — загадочные странники Таркира, которых в любое время года можно увидеть высоко парящими над его землями. Никто не знает их истинного предназначения, но они часто становятся предвестниками яростных конфликтов или поворотных моментов в истории.

foreignNames.name: 高年拉玛苏
foreignNames.text: 飞行
foreignNames.flavor: 拉玛苏是鞑契的神秘旅人，终年高飞于万里长空，穿行世界。没人知道他们目的何在，不过常常能在历史剧变或转捩前夕见到他们的身影。

foreignNames.name: 高年拉瑪蘇
foreignNames.text: 飛行
foreignNames.flavor: 拉瑪蘇是韃契的神秘旅人，終年高飛於萬里長空，穿行世界。沒人知道他們目的何在，不過常常能在歷史劇變或轉捩前夕見到他們的身影。

cards.originalText: Flying

cards.name: War Behemoth
cards.text: Morph {4}{W} (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.)
cards.flavor:
"The Houses always hope for peace, but we always pack for war."
—Gvar Barzeel, krumar commander

rulings.text: Morph lets you cast a card face down by paying {3}, and lets you turn the face-down permanent face up any time you have priority by paying its morph cost.

The face-down spell has no mana cost and has a converted mana cost of 0. When you cast a face-down spell, put it on the stack face down so no other player knows what it is, and pay {3}. This is an alternative cost.

When the spell resolves, it enters the battlefield as a 2/2 creature with no name, mana cost, creature types, or abilities. It’s colorless and has a converted mana cost of 0. Other effects that apply to the creature can still grant it any of these characteristics.

Any time you have priority, you may turn the face-down creature face up by revealing what its morph cost is and paying that cost. This is a special action. It doesn’t use the stack and can’t be responded to. Only a face-down permanent can be turned face up this way; a face-down spell cannot.
Because the permanent is on the battlefield both before and after it’s turned face up, turning a permanent face up doesn’t cause any enters-the-battlefield abilities to trigger.

A permanent that turns face up or face down changes characteristics but is otherwise the same permanent. Spells and abilities that were targeting that permanent, as well as Auras and Equipment that were attached to the permanent, aren’t affected.
At any time, you can look at a face-down spell or permanent you control. You can’t look at face-down spells or permanents you don’t control unless an effect instructs you to do so.

You must ensure that your face-down spells and permanents can easily be differentiated from each other. You’re not allowed to mix up the cards that represent them on the battlefield in order to confuse other players. The order they entered the battlefield should remain clear. Common methods for doing this include using markers or dice, or simply placing them in order on the battlefield.
If a face-down permanent leaves the battlefield, you must reveal it. You must also reveal all face-down spells and permanents you control if you leave the game or if the game ends.

foreignNames.name: Kriegsbehemoth
foreignNames.text: Morph {4}{W} (Du kannst diese Karte verdeckt für {3} als eine 2/2 Kreatur wirken. Decke sie zu einem beliebigen Zeitpunkt für ihre Morph-Kosten auf.)
foreignNames.flavor: „Die Häuser hoffen immer auf Frieden, aber wir packen stets für den Krieg." —Gvar Barzeel, Kommandeur der Krumar

foreignNames.name: Behemot bélico
foreignNames.text: Metamorfosis {4}{W}. (Puedes lanzar esta carta boca abajo como una criatura 2/2 pagando {3}. Ponla boca arriba en cualquier momento pagando su coste de metamorfosis.)
foreignNames.flavor: "Las dinastías siempre esperan la paz, pero nosotros siempre nos preparamos para la guerra". —Gavar Barzil, comandante krumar

foreignNames.name: Béhémoth de guerre
foreignNames.text: Mue {4}{W} (Vous pouvez lancer cette carte face cachée comme une créature 2/2 pour {3}. Retournez-la à tout moment pour son coût de mue.)
foreignNames.flavor: « Les Maisons espèrent toujours la paix, mais se préparent toujours à la guerre. » —Gvar Barzeel, commandant krumar

foreignNames.name: Behemoth da Guerra
foreignNames.text: Metamorfosi {4}{W} (Puoi lanciare questa carta a faccia in giù come una creatura 2/2 pagando {3}. Girala a faccia in su in qualsiasi momento pagando il suo costo di metamorfosi.)
foreignNames.flavor: "Le Casate auspicano sempre la pace, ma marciano sempre pronte alla guerra." —Gvar Barzeel, comandante dei krumar

foreignNames.name: 軍用ビヒモス
foreignNames.text: 変異{4}{W}（あなたはこのカードを、{3}で２/２クリーチャーとして裏向きに唱えてもよい。これの変異コストで、これをいつでも表向きにしてよい。）
foreignNames.type: クリーチャー — ビースト
foreignNames.flavor: 「アブザン家は常に平和を望んでいるが、我々は常に戦争に備えている。」 ――クルーマの司令官、ガヴァール・バーズィール

foreignNames.name: 전쟁 거대괴수
foreignNames.text: 변이 {4}{W} (당신은 {3}을 지불해서 이 카드를 뒷면 상태의 2/2 생물로 발동할 수 있다. 언제든지 변이 비용을 지불하고 앞면이 보이도록 뒤집을 수 있다.)
foreignNames.flavor: "아브잔 일족들은 언제나 평화를 원하지만, 우리는 언제나 전쟁을 준비하지." —크루마 사령관 가바르 바질

foreignNames.name: Behemoth de Guerra
foreignNames.text: Metamorfose {4}{W} (Você pode conjurar este card com a face voltada para baixo como uma criatura 2/2 por {3}. Volte sua face para cima a qualquer momento pagando seu custo de metamorfose.)
foreignNames.flavor: "As Dinastias sempre têm esperança de paz, mas nós sempre nos preparamos para a guerra." — Gvar Barzeel, comandante krumar

foreignNames.name: Боевой Исполин
foreignNames.text: Оборотень {4}{W} (Вы можете разыграть эту карту рубашкой вверх как существо 2/2 за {3}. Переверните ее рубашкой вниз в любой момент за ее стоимость Оборотня.)
foreignNames.flavor: «Семьи всегда надеются на мир, но мы всегда готовимся к войне». — Гвар Барзил, командир крумаров

foreignNames.name: 战争贝西摩斯
foreignNames.text: 变身{4}{W}（你可牌面朝下地施放此牌并支付{3}，将其当成2/2生物。可随时支付其变身费用使其翻回正面。）
foreignNames.flavor: 「眷族希冀和平永驻，但我们一直在行军备战。」 ～孑遗指挥官格瓦巴泽

foreignNames.name: 戰爭貝西摩斯
foreignNames.text: 變身{4}{W}（你可牌面朝下地施放此牌並支付{3}，將其當成2/2生物。可隨時支付其變身費用使其翻回正面。）
foreignNames.flavor: 「眷族希冀和平永駐，但我們一直在行軍備戰。」 ～孑遺指揮官格瓦巴澤

cards.originalText: Morph {4}{W} (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.)

cards.name: Watcher of the Roost
cards.text:
Flying
Morph—Reveal a white card in your hand. (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.)
When Watcher of the Roost is turned face up, you gain 2 life.

foreignNames.name: Wächter des Spähnests
foreignNames.text:
Fliegend
Morph—Zeige eine weiße Karte auf deiner Hand offen vor. (Du kannst diese Karte verdeckt für {3} als eine 2/2 Kreatur wirken. Decke sie zu einem beliebigen Zeitpunkt für ihre Morph-Kosten auf.)
Wenn der Wächter des Spähnests aufgedeckt wird, erhältst du 2 Lebenspunkte dazu.

foreignNames.name: Vigilante del nido
foreignNames.text:
Vuela.
Metamorfosis—Muestra una carta blanca de tu mano. (Puedes lanzar esta carta boca abajo como una criatura 2/2 pagando {3}. Ponla boca arriba en cualquier momento pagando su coste de metamorfosis.)
Cuando el Vigilante del nido se ponga boca arriba, ganas 2 vidas.

foreignNames.name: Gardien du perchoir
foreignNames.text:
Vol
Mue — Révélez une carte blanche de votre main. (Vous pouvez lancer cette carte face cachée comme une créature 2/2 pour {3}. Retournez-la à tout moment pour son coût de mue.)
Quand le Gardien du perchoir est retourné face visible, vous gagnez 2 points de vie.

foreignNames.name: Guardiano del Trespolo
foreignNames.text:
Volare
Metamorfosi—Rivela una carta bianca dalla tua mano. (Puoi lanciare questa carta a faccia in giù come una creatura 2/2 pagando {3}. Girala a faccia in su in qualsiasi momento pagando il suo costo di metamorfosi.)
Quando il Guardiano del Trespolo viene girato a faccia in su, guadagni 2 punti vita.

foreignNames.name: 休息地の見張り
foreignNames.text:
飛行
変異 ― あなたの手札にある白のカードを１枚公開する。（あなたはこのカードを、{3}で２/２クリーチャーとして裏向きに唱えてもよい。これの変異コストで、これをいつでも表向きにしてよい。）
休息地の見張りが表向きになったとき、あなたは２点のライフを得る。
foreignNames.type: クリーチャー — 鳥・兵士

foreignNames.name: 둥지 파수꾼
foreignNames.text:
비행
변이—당신의 손에서 백색 카드 한 장을 공개한다. (당신은 {3}을 지불해서 이 카드를 뒷면 상태의 2/2 생물로 발동할 수 있다. 언제든지 변이 비용을 지불하고 앞면이 보이도록 뒤집을 수 있다.)
둥지 파수꾼이 앞면으로 뒤집히면, 당신은 생명 2점을 얻는다.

foreignNames.name: Vigia do Poleiro
foreignNames.text:
Voar
Metamorfose — Revele um card branco na sua mão. (Você pode conjurar este card com a face voltada para baixo como uma criatura 2/2 por {3}. Volte sua face para cima a qualquer momento pagando seu custo de metamorfose.)
Quando Vigia do Poleiro é voltado para cima, você ganha 2 pontos de vida.

foreignNames.name: Дозорный Насеста
foreignNames.text:
Полет
Оборотень — Покажите белую карту, находящуюся в вашей руке. (Вы можете разыграть эту карту рубашкой вверх как существо 2/2 за {3}. Переверните ее рубашкой вниз в любой момент за ее стоимость Оборотня.)
Когда Дозорный Насеста переворачивается рубашкой вниз, вы получаете 2 жизни.

foreignNames.name: 眺巢看守
foreignNames.text:
飞行
变身～从你手上展示一张白色牌。（你可牌面朝下地施放此牌并支付{3}，将其当成2/2生物。可随时支付其变身费用使其翻回正面。）
当眺巢看守翻回正面时，你获得2点生命。

foreignNames.name: 眺巢看守
foreignNames.text:
飛行
變身～從你手上展示一張白色牌。（你可牌面朝下地施放此牌並支付{3}，將其當成2/2生物。可隨時支付其變身費用使其翻回正面。）
當眺巢看守翻回正面時，你獲得2點生命。

cards.originalText:
Flying
Morph—
Reveal a white card in your hand. (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.)
When Watcher of the Roost is turned face up, you gain 2 life.

cards.name: Wingmate Roc
cards.text:
Flying
Raid — When Wingmate Roc enters the battlefield, if you attacked this turn, create a 3/4 white Bird creature token with flying.
Whenever Wingmate Roc attacks, you gain 1 life for each attacking creature.

rulings.text: Count the number of attacking creatures when the last ability resolves, including Wingmate Roc itself if it’s still on the battlefield, to determine how much life you gain.

Raid abilities care only that you attacked with a creature. It doesn’t matter how many creatures you attacked with, or which opponent or planeswalker controlled by an opponent those creatures attacked.

Raid abilities evaluate the entire turn to see if you attacked with a creature. That creature doesn’t have to still be on the battlefield. Similarly, the player or planeswalker it attacked doesn’t have to still be in the game or on the battlefield, respectively.

foreignNames.name: Treuschwingen-Roc
foreignNames.text:
Fliegend
Überfall — Wenn der Treuschwingen-Roc ins Spiel kommt und falls du in diesem Zug mit mindestens einer Kreatur angegriffen hast, bringe einen 3/4 weißen Vogel-Kreaturenspielstein mit Flugfähigkeit ins Spiel.
Immer wenn der Treuschwingen-Roc angreift, erhältst du für jede angreifende Kreatur 1 Lebenspunkt dazu.

foreignNames.name: Volañera roc
foreignNames.text:
Vuela.
Incursión — Cuando la Volañera roc entre al campo de batalla, si atacaste con una criatura este turno, pon en el campo de batalla una ficha de criatura Ave blanca 3/4 con la habilidad de volar.
Siempre que la Volañera roc ataque, ganas 1 vida por cada criatura atacante.

foreignNames.name: Rokh compagnon
foreignNames.text:
Vol
Saccage — Quand le Rokh compagnon arrive sur le champ de bataille, si vous avez attaqué avec une créature ce tour-ci, mettez sur le champ de bataille un jeton de créature 3/4 blanche Oiseau avec le vol.
À chaque fois que le Rokh compagnon attaque, vous gagnez 1 point de vie pour chaque créature attaquante.

foreignNames.name: Roc Compagna d'Ala
foreignNames.text:
Volare
Incursione — Quando la Roc Compagna d'Ala entra nel campo di battaglia, se hai attaccato con una creatura in questo turno, metti sul campo di battaglia una pedina creatura Uccello 3/4 bianca con volare.
Ogniqualvolta la Roc Compagna d'Ala attacca, guadagni 1 punto vita per ogni creatura attaccante.

foreignNames.name: 風番いのロック
foreignNames.text:
飛行
強襲 ― 風番いのロックが戦場に出たとき、このターンにあなたがクリーチャーで攻撃していた場合、飛行を持つ白の３/４の鳥・クリーチャー・トークンを１体戦場に出す。
風番いのロックが攻撃するたび、あなたは攻撃クリーチャー１体につき１点のライフを得る。

foreignNames.name: 짝비행 로크
foreignNames.text:
비행
습격 — 짝비행 로크가 전장에 들어올 때, 당신이 이 턴에 생물로 공격했다면 비행을 가진 3/4 백색 조류 생물 토큰 한 개를 전장에 놓는다.
짝비행 로크가 공격할 때마다, 당신은 공격생물 한 개당 생명 1점을 얻는다.

foreignNames.name: Roca do Voo Duplo
foreignNames.text:
Voar
Raide — Quando Roca do Voo Duplo entrar no campo de batalha, se você atacou com uma criatura neste turno, coloque no campo de batalha uma ficha de criatura branca 3/4 do tipo Ave com voar.
Toda vez que Roca do Voo Duplo ataca, você ganha 1 ponto de vida para cada criatura atacante.

foreignNames.name: Рок, Крылатый Собрат
foreignNames.text:
Полет
Набег — Когда Рок, Крылатый Собрат выходит на поле битвы, если в этом ходу вы атаковали существом, положите на поле битвы одну фишку существа 3/4 белая Птица с Полетом.
Каждый раз, когда Рок, Крылатый Собрат атакует, вы получаете 1 жизнь за каждое атакующее существо.

foreignNames.name: 翼伴洛克鸟
foreignNames.text:
飞行
突击～当翼伴洛克鸟进战场时，若你于本回合中曾以生物攻击，则将一个3/4白色，具飞行异能的鸟衍生生物放进战场。
每当翼伴洛克鸟攻击时，每有一个进行攻击的生物，你便获得1点生命。

foreignNames.name: 翼伴洛克鳥
foreignNames.text:
飛行
突擊～當翼伴洛克鳥進戰場時，若你於本回合中曾以生物攻擊，則將一個3/4白色，具飛行異能的鳥衍生生物放進戰場。
每當翼伴洛克鳥攻擊時，每有一個進行攻擊的生物，你便獲得1點生命。

cards.originalText:
Flying

cards.name: Clever Impersonator
cards.text: You may have Clever Impersonator enter the battlefield as a copy of any nonland permanent on the battlefield.
cards.flavor:
"Our own selves are the greatest obstacles to enlightenment."
—Narset, khan of the Jeskai

rulings.text: If the chosen permanent is a token, Clever Impersonator copies the original characteristics of that token as defined by the effect that put that token onto the battlefield. Clever Impersonator is not a token.
You choose which nonland permanent Clever Impersonator will copy, if any, as it enters the battlefield. This doesn’t target that nonland permanent.
Remember that if you control more than one legendary permanent with the same name, you’ll choose one to remain on the battlefield and put the rest into their owner’s graveyard.

If Clever Impersonator enters the battlefield as a copy of a planeswalker, it will enter the battlefield with a number of loyalty counters on it equal to the loyalty printed in the lower right corner of the planeswalker card. It won’t copy the number of loyalty counters on the original planeswalker.

Clever Impersonator copies exactly what is printed on the chosen permanent (unless that permanent is copying something else or is a token; see below). It doesn’t copy whether that permanent is tapped or untapped, whether that permanent has any counters on it or any Auras and/or Equipment attached to it, and it doesn’t copy any non-copy effects that have changed that permanent’s power, toughness, types, color, abilities, or so on.
If the chosen permanent has {X} in its mana cost, X is considered to be 0.

If the chosen permanent is a copy of something else (for example, if the chosen permanent is another Clever Impersonator), then your Clever Impersonator enters the battlefield as whatever the chosen permanent copied.

Any enters-the-battlefield abilities of the chosen permanent will trigger when Clever Impersonator enters the battlefield. Any “as [this permanent] enters the battlefield” or “[this permanent] enters the battlefield with” abilities of the chosen permanent will also work.

If Clever Impersonator enters the battlefield at the same time as another permanent, it can’t become a copy of that permanent. You may choose only a nonland permanent that’s already on the battlefield.

You can choose not to copy anything. In that case, Clever Impersonator enters the battlefield as a 0/0 creature, and it’s put into the graveyard immediately (unless something is raising its toughness above 0).

cards.name: Dig Through Time
cards.text:
Delve (Each card you exile from your graveyard while casting this spell pays for {1}.)
Look at the top seven cards of your library. Put two of them into your hand and the rest on the bottom of your library in any order.

rulings.text: Delve doesn't change a spell's mana cost or mana value. For example, Treasure Cruise's mana value is 8 even if you exiled three cards to cast it.

You can exile cards to pay only for generic mana, and you can't exile more cards than the generic mana requirement of a spell with delve. For example, you can't exile more than seven cards from your graveyard to cast Treasure Cruise unless an effect has increased its cost.
Because delve isn't an alternative cost, it can be used in conjunction with alternative costs, such as flashback. It can also be used to pay for additional costs that include generic mana.

cards.name: Dragon's Eye Savants
cards.text:
Morph—Reveal a blue card in your hand. (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.)
When Dragon's Eye Savants is turned face up, look at target opponent's hand.

rulings.text: Morph lets you cast a card face down by paying {3}, and lets you turn the face-down permanent face up any time you have priority by paying its morph cost.

The face-down spell has no mana cost and has a converted mana cost of 0. When you cast a face-down spell, put it on the stack face down so no other player knows what it is, and pay {3}. This is an alternative cost.

When the spell resolves, it enters the battlefield as a 2/2 creature with no name, mana cost, creature types, or abilities. It’s colorless and has a converted mana cost of 0. Other effects that apply to the creature can still grant it any of these characteristics.

Any time you have priority, you may turn the face-down creature face up by revealing what its morph cost is and paying that cost. This is a special action. It doesn’t use the stack and can’t be responded to. Only a face-down permanent can be turned face up this way; a face-down spell cannot.
Because the permanent is on the battlefield both before and after it’s turned face up, turning a permanent face up doesn’t cause any enters-the-battlefield abilities to trigger.

A permanent that turns face up or face down changes characteristics but is otherwise the same permanent. Spells and abilities that were targeting that permanent, as well as Auras and Equipment that were attached to the permanent, aren’t affected.
At any time, you can look at a face-down spell or permanent you control. You can’t look at face-down spells or permanents you don’t control unless an effect instructs you to do so.

You must ensure that your face-down spells and permanents can easily be differentiated from each other. You’re not allowed to mix up the cards that represent them on the battlefield in order to confuse other players. The order they entered the battlefield should remain clear. Common methods for doing this include using markers or dice, or simply placing them in order on the battlefield.
If a face-down permanent leaves the battlefield, you must reveal it. You must also reveal all face-down spells and permanents you control if you leave the game or if the game ends.

foreignNames.name: Weise des Drachenauges
foreignNames.text:
Morph—Zeige eine blaue Karte auf deiner Hand offen vor. (Du kannst diese Karte verdeckt für {3} als eine 2/2 Kreatur wirken. Decke sie zu einem beliebigen Zeitpunkt für ihre Morph-Kosten auf.)
Wenn die Weisen des Drachenauges aufgedeckt werden, schaue dir die Karten auf der Hand eines Gegners deiner Wahl an.

foreignNames.name: Sabios del ojo del dragón
foreignNames.text:
Metamorfosis—Muestra una carta azul de tu mano. (Puedes lanzar esta carta boca abajo como una criatura 2/2 pagando {3}. Ponla boca arriba en cualquier momento pagando su coste de metamorfosis.)
Cuando los Sabios del ojo del dragón se pongan boca arriba, mira la mano del oponente objetivo.

foreignNames.name: Savants de l'Œil du dragon
foreignNames.text:
Mue — Révélez une carte bleue de votre main. (Vous pouvez lancer cette carte face cachée comme une créature 2/2 pour {3}. Retournez-la à tout moment pour son coût de mue.)
Quand les Savants de l'Œil du dragon sont retournés face visible, regardez la main d'un adversaire ciblé.

foreignNames.name: Sapienti dell'Occhio di Drago
foreignNames.text:
Metamorfosi—Rivela una carta blu dalla tua mano. (Puoi lanciare questa carta a faccia in giù come una creatura 2/2 pagando {3}. Girala a faccia in su in qualsiasi momento pagando il suo costo di metamorfosi.)
Quando i Sapienti dell'Occhio di Drago vengono girati a faccia in su, guarda la mano di un avversario bersaglio.

foreignNames.name: 龍の眼の学者
foreignNames.text:
変異 ― あなたの手札にある青のカードを１枚公開する。（あなたはこのカードを、{3}で２/２クリーチャーとして裏向きに唱えてもよい。これの変異コストで、これをいつでも表向きにしてよい。）
龍の眼の学者が表向きになったとき、対戦相手１人を対象とし、そのプレイヤーの手札を見る。
foreignNames.type: クリーチャー — 人間・ウィザード

foreignNames.name: 용의 눈 석학
foreignNames.text:
변이—당신의 손에서 청색 카드 한 장을 공개한다. (당신은 {3}을 지불해서 이 카드를 뒷면 상태의 2/2 생물로 발동할 수 있다. 언제든지 변이 비용을 지불하고 앞면이 보이도록 뒤집을 수 있다.)
용의 눈 석학이 앞면으로 뒤집히면, 상대를 목표로 정한다. 그 상대의 손을 본다.

foreignNames.name: Sábios do Olho do Dragão
foreignNames.text:
Metamorfose — Revele um card azul na sua mão. (Você pode conjurar este card com a face voltada para baixo como uma criatura 2/2 por {3}. Volte sua face para cima a qualquer momento pagando seu custo de metamorfose.)
Quando Sábios do Olho do Dragão for voltado para cima, olhe a mão do oponente alvo.

foreignNames.name: Мудрецы Ока Дракона
foreignNames.text:
Оборотень — Покажите синюю карту, находящуюся в вашей руке. (Вы можете разыграть эту карту рубашкой вверх как существо 2/2 за {3}. Переверните ее рубашкой вниз в любой момент за ее стоимость Оборотня.)
Когда Мудрецы Ока Дракона переворачиваются рубашкой вниз, посмотрите руку целевого оппонента.

foreignNames.name: 龙目学者
foreignNames.text:
变身～从你手上展示一张蓝色牌。（你可牌面朝下地施放此牌并支付{3}，将其当成2/2生物。可随时支付其变身费用使其翻回正面。）
当龙目学者翻回正面时，检视目标对手的手牌。

foreignNames.name: 龍目學者
foreignNames.text:
變身～從你手上展示一張藍色牌。（你可牌面朝下地施放此牌並支付{3}，將其當成2/2生物。可隨時支付其變身費用使其翻回正面。）
當龍目學者翻回正面時，檢視目標對手的手牌。

cards.originalText:
Morph—
Reveal a blue card in your hand. (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.)
When Dragon's Eye Savants is turned face up, look at target opponent's hand.

cards.name: Embodiment of Spring
cards.text: {1}{G}, {T}, Sacrifice Embodiment of Spring: Search your library for a basic land card, put it onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle.
cards.flavor: Arel dreamed of winter's end. The next morning she followed a strange trail and found a seedling in the snow.

foreignNames.name: Verkörperung des Frühlings
foreignNames.text: {1}{G}, {T}, opfere die Verkörperung des Frühlings: Durchsuche deine Bibliothek nach einer Standardland-Karte, bringe sie getappt ins Spiel und mische dann deine Bibliothek.
foreignNames.flavor: Arel träumte vom Ende des Winters. Am nächsten Morgen folgte sie einer seltsamen Spur und fand einen Spross im Schnee.

foreignNames.name: Encarnación de la primavera
foreignNames.text: {1}{G}, {T}, sacrificar la Encarnación de la primavera: Busca en tu biblioteca una carta de tierra básica, ponla en el campo de batalla girada y luego baraja tu biblioteca.
foreignNames.flavor: Arel soñaba con el final del invierno. Al día siguiente, siguió un extraño rastro y halló un brote entre la nieve.

foreignNames.name: Incarnation du printemps
foreignNames.text: {1}{G}, {T}, sacrifiez l'Incarnation du printemps : Cherchez dans votre bibliothèque une carte de terrain de base, mettez-la sur le champ de bataille engagée et mélangez ensuite votre bibliothèque.
foreignNames.flavor: Arel rêva de la fin de l'hiver. Au matin suivant, elle suivit d'étranges traces et découvrit un arbrisseau dans la neige.

foreignNames.name: Incarnazione della Primavera
foreignNames.text: {1}{G}, {T}, Sacrifica l'Incarnazione della Primavera: Passa in rassegna il tuo grimorio per una carta terra base, mettila sul campo di battaglia TAPpata, poi rimescola il tuo grimorio.
foreignNames.flavor: Arel sognò la fine dell'inverno. Il mattino seguente, seguì uno strano sentiero e trovò un germoglio nella neve.

foreignNames.name: 春の具象化
foreignNames.text: {1}{G}, {T}, 春の具象化を生け贄に捧げる：あなたのライブラリーから基本土地・カードを１枚探してそれをタップ状態で戦場に出し、その後、あなたのライブラリーを切り直す。
foreignNames.type: クリーチャー — エレメンタル
foreignNames.flavor: アレルは夢で冬の終わりを見た。明くる朝、彼女は不思議な跡をたどっていくと、雪の中に芽吹いた１つの萌芽を見つけた。

foreignNames.name: 봄의 상징
foreignNames.text: {1}{G}, {T}, 봄의 상징을 희생한다: 당신의 서고에서 기본 대지 카드 한 장을 찾아 탭된 채로 전장에 놓은 후, 당신의 서고를 섞는다.
foreignNames.flavor: 아렐은 겨울이 끝나는 꿈을 꾸었다. 다음 날 아침, 낯선 흔적을 따라간 그녀는 눈 속에서 고개를 치켜든 묘목을 발견했다.

foreignNames.name: Encarnação da Primavera
foreignNames.text: {1}{G}, {T}, Sacrifique Encarnação da Primavera: Procure um card de terreno básico no seu grimório, coloque-o no campo de batalha virado e depois embaralhe seu grimório.
foreignNames.flavor: Arel sonhou com o fim do inverno. Na manhã seguinte, ela seguiu uma trilha estranha e encontrou um pequeno broto em meio a neve.

foreignNames.name: Воплощение Весны
foreignNames.text: {1}{G}, {T}, пожертвуйте Воплощение Весны: найдите в вашей библиотеке карту базовой земли, положите ее на поле битвы повернутой, затем перетасуйте вашу библиотеку.
foreignNames.flavor: Арель приснилось, что зима закончилась. На следующее утро она пошла по странному следу и нашла в снегу росток.

foreignNames.name: 春晓化身
foreignNames.text: {1}{G}，{T}，牺牲春晓化身：从你的牌库中搜寻一张基本地牌，将之横置进战场，然后将你的牌库洗牌。
foreignNames.flavor: 阿瑞尔在睡梦中，看到了寒冬终结的景象。次日清晨，她循着一条莫名踪迹，在雪中寻得一株新绿。

foreignNames.name: 春曉化身
foreignNames.text: {1}{G}，{T}，犧牲春曉化身：從你的牌庫中搜尋一張基本地牌，將之橫置進戰場，然後將你的牌庫洗牌。
foreignNames.flavor: 阿瑞爾在睡夢中，看到了寒冬終結的景象。次日清晨，她循著一條莫名蹤跡，在雪中尋得一株新綠。

cards.originalText: {1}{G}, {T}, Sacrifice Embodiment of Spring: Search your library for a basic land card, put it onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle your library.

cards.name: Force Away
cards.text:
Return target creature to its owner's hand.
Ferocious — If you control a creature with power 4 or greater, you may draw a card. If you do, discard a card.
cards.flavor: Where an enemy once rode, not even a whisper remains.

rulings.text: Some ferocious abilities that appear on instants and sorceries use the word “instead.” These spells have an upgraded effect if you control a creature with power 4 or greater as they resolve. For these, you only get the upgraded effect, not both effects.
Ferocious abilities of instants and sorceries that don’t use the word “instead” will provide an additional effect if you control a creature with power 4 or greater as they resolve.

foreignNames.name: Wegzwingen
foreignNames.text:
Bringe eine Kreatur deiner Wahl auf die Hand ihres Besitzers zurück.
Wildheit — Falls du eine Kreatur mit Stärke 4 oder mehr kontrollierst, kannst du eine Karte ziehen. Falls du dies tust, wirf eine Karte ab.
foreignNames.flavor: Wo einst ein Feind ritt, bleibt nicht einmal ein Flüstern zurück.

foreignNames.name: Retirada forzada
foreignNames.text:
Regresa la criatura objetivo a la mano de su propietario.
Ferocidad — Si controlas una criatura con fuerza de 4 o más, puedes robar una carta. Si lo haces, descarta una carta.
foreignNames.flavor: Donde antes cabalgaba un enemigo ya no queda ni un susurro.

foreignNames.name: Éviction
foreignNames.text:
Renvoyez la créature ciblée dans la main de son propriétaire.
Férocité — Si vous contrôlez une créature avec une force supérieure ou égale à 4, vous pouvez piocher une carte. Si vous faites ainsi, défaussez-vous d'une carte.
foreignNames.flavor: De l'ennemi qui rôdait, il ne resta pas même un murmure.

foreignNames.name: Abbandono Forzato
foreignNames.text:
Fai tornare una creatura bersaglio in mano al suo proprietario.
Ferocia — Se controlli una creatura con forza pari o superiore a 4, puoi pescare una carta. Se lo fai, scarta una carta.
foreignNames.flavor: Dove un tempo cavalcava un nemico, non resta più neppure un sussurro.

foreignNames.name: 引き剥がし
foreignNames.text:
クリーチャー１体を対象とし、それをオーナーの手札に戻す。
獰猛 ― あなたがパワーが４以上のクリーチャーをコントロールしているなら、あなたはカードを１枚引いてもよい。そうしたなら、カードを１枚捨てる。
foreignNames.flavor: 敵がかつて騎乗していたが、今ではその囁きすら残されていない。

foreignNames.name: 강제 추방
foreignNames.text:
생물을 목표로 정한다. 그 생물을 소유자의 손으로 되돌린다.
흉포 — 당신이 공격력이 4 이상인 생물을 조종한다면, 당신은 카드 한 장을 뽑을 수 있다. 그렇게 한다면, 카드 한 장을 버린다.
foreignNames.flavor: 적의 발길이 닿았던 곳에는 속삭임조차 남지 않는다.

foreignNames.name: Rechaçar
foreignNames.text:
Devolva a criatura alvo para a mão de seu dono.
Feroz — Se você controla uma criatura com poder igual ou superior a 4, você pode comprar um card. Se fizer isso, descarte um card.
foreignNames.flavor: Onde um inimigo outrora cavalgou, não resta sequer um sussurro.

foreignNames.name: Насильное Удаление
foreignNames.text:
Верните целевое существо в руку его владельца.
Свирепость — Если вы контролируете существо с силой не менее 4, вы можете взять карту. Если вы это делаете, сбросьте карту.
foreignNames.flavor: Там, где однажды прошел враг, не слышно даже шороха.

foreignNames.name: 驱离
foreignNames.text:
将目标生物移回其拥有者手上。
威猛～如果你操控力量等于或大于4的生物，则你可以抓一张牌。如果你如此作，则弃一张牌。
foreignNames.flavor: 曾有敌军驰骋，如今悄无声息。

foreignNames.name: 驅離
foreignNames.text:
將目標生物移回其擁有者手上。
威猛～如果你操控力量等於或大於4的生物，則你可以抽一張牌。如果你如此作，則棄一張牌。
foreignNames.flavor: 曾有敵軍馳騁，如今悄無聲息。

cards.originalText:
Return target creature to its owner's hand.
Ferocious — If you control a creature with power 4 or greater, you may draw a card. If you do, discard a card.

cards.name: Glacial Stalker
cards.text: Morph {4}{U} (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.)
cards.flavor:
"Have you spent a winter high in the mountains, where the ice walks and speaks to the wind? It is not a place for those who have not learned respect."
—Ulnok, Temur shaman

rulings.text: The face-down spell has no mana cost and has a converted mana cost of 0. When you cast a face-down spell, put it on the stack face down so no other player knows what it is, and pay {3}. This is an alternative cost.
Morph lets you cast a card face down by paying {3}, and lets you turn the face-down permanent face up any time you have priority by paying its morph cost.

Because the permanent is on the battlefield both before and after it’s turned face up, turning a permanent face up doesn’t cause any enters-the-battlefield abilities to trigger.

A permanent that turns face up or face down changes characteristics but is otherwise the same permanent. Spells and abilities that were targeting that permanent, as well as Auras and Equipment that were attached to the permanent, aren’t affected.

You’re not allowed to mix up the cards that represent them on the battlefield in order to confuse other players. The order they entered the battlefield should remain clear. Common methods for doing this include using markers or dice, or simply placing them in order on the battlefield.
If a face-down permanent leaves the battlefield, you must reveal it. You must also reveal all face-down spells and permanents you control if you leave the game or if the game ends.

foreignNames.name: Gletscher-Pirscher
foreignNames.text: Morph {4}{U} (Du kannst diese Karte verdeckt für {3} als eine 2/2 Kreatur wirken. Decke sie zu einem beliebigen Zeitpunkt für ihre Morph-Kosten auf.)
foreignNames.flavor: „Hast du schon einmal einen Winter hoch droben in den Bergen verbracht, wo das Eis wandert und mit dem Wind spricht? Es ist kein Ort für jene, die keinen Respekt gelernt haben." —Ulnok, Schamane der Temur

foreignNames.name: Acechador glacial
foreignNames.text: Metamorfosis {4}{U}. (Puedes lanzar esta carta boca abajo como una criatura 2/2 pagando {3}. Ponla boca arriba en cualquier momento pagando su coste de metamorfosis.)
foreignNames.flavor: "¿Has pasado algún invierno en lo alto de las montañas, donde el hielo camina y habla a los vientos? No es un lugar adecuado para aquellos que no conocen el respeto". —Ulnok, chamán temur

foreignNames.name: Pisteur glacial
foreignNames.text: Mue {4}{U} (Vous pouvez lancer cette carte face cachée comme une créature 2/2 pour {3}. Retournez-la à tout moment pour son coût de mue.)
foreignNames.flavor: « Avez-vous déjà passé un hiver au sommet des montagnes, là où la glace marche et converse avec le vent ? Ce n'est pas un lieu pour quiconque n'a pas appris le respect. » —Ulnok, shamane temurien

foreignNames.name: Inseguitore Glaciale
foreignNames.text: Metamorfosi {4}{U} (Puoi lanciare questa carta a faccia in giù come una creatura 2/2 pagando {3}. Girala a faccia in su in qualsiasi momento pagando il suo costo di metamorfosi.)
foreignNames.flavor: "Hai mai trascorso un inverno sulle vette dei monti, dove il ghiaccio cammina e conversa col vento? Non è un luogo adatto a chi non conosce il rispetto." —Ulnok, sciamano Temur

foreignNames.name: 氷河の忍び寄り
foreignNames.text: 変異{4}{U}（あなたはこのカードを、{3}で２/２クリーチャーとして裏向きに唱えてもよい。これの変異コストで、これをいつでも表向きにしてよい。）
foreignNames.type: クリーチャー — エレメンタル
foreignNames.flavor: 「お前は、氷が歩いて風と会話する山の頂で冬を過ごしたことがあるか？あの地は礼儀を知らぬ者が足を踏み入れるべき場所ではない。」 ――ティムールのシャーマン、ウルナック

foreignNames.name: 빙하 추적자
foreignNames.text: 변이 {4}{U} (당신은 {3}을 지불해서 이 카드를 뒷면 상태의 2/2 생물로 발동할 수 있다. 언제든지 변이 비용을 지불하고 앞면이 보이도록 뒤집을 수 있다.)
foreignNames.flavor: "얼음이 걸으며 바람과 대화를 나누는 산 정상 부근에서 겨울을 난 적이 있나? 존경하는 법을 배우지 못한 이들이 있을만한 장소는 아니라네." —테무르 주술사 울낙

foreignNames.name: Espreitador Glacial
foreignNames.text: Metamorfose {4}{U} (Você pode conjurar este card com a face voltada para baixo como uma criatura 2/2 por {3}. Volte sua face para cima a qualquer momento pagando seu custo de metamorfose.)
foreignNames.flavor: "Você passou o inverno no alto das montanhas, onde o gelo caminha e fala com o vento? Lá não é lugar para aqueles que não aprenderam o que é respeito." — Ulnok, xamã Temur

foreignNames.name: Ледяной Охотник
foreignNames.text: Оборотень {4}{U} (Вы можете разыграть эту карту рубашкой вверх как существо 2/2 за {3}. Переверните ее рубашкой вниз в любой момент за ее стоимость Оборотня.)
foreignNames.flavor: «Тебе доводилось зимовать высоко в горах, где лед двигается сам собой и говорит с ветром? Там нет места тем, кто не научился уважению». — Улнок, темурский шаман

foreignNames.name: 冰川伏击客
foreignNames.text: 变身{4}{U}（你可牌面朝下地施放此牌并支付{3}，将其当成2/2生物。可随时支付其变身费用使其翻回正面。）
foreignNames.flavor: 「你可曾在山巅过冬？那里有起身踏步，呼啸狂风的冰川。不知道何谓敬畏的人根本待不下去。」 ～铁木尔祭师乌勒诺克

foreignNames.name: 冰川伏擊客
foreignNames.text: 變身{4}{U}（你可牌面朝下地施放此牌並支付{3}，將其當成2/2生物。可隨時支付其變身費用使其翻回正面。）
foreignNames.flavor: 「你可曾在山巔過冬？那裡有起身踏步，呼嘯狂風的冰川。不知道何謂敬畏的人根本待不下去。」 ～鐵木爾祭師烏勒諾克

cards.originalText: Morph {4}{U} (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.)

cards.name: Icy Blast
cards.text:
Tap X target creatures.
Ferocious — If you control a creature with power 4 or greater, those creatures don't untap during their controllers' next untap steps.
cards.flavor: "Do not think the sand or the sun will hold back the breath of winter."

rulings.text: You check if you control a creature with power 4 or greater as Icy Blast resolves. It doesn’t matter if you control such a creature during any of the relevant untap steps.
Icy Blast can target a creature that’s already tapped. It still won’t untap during its controller’s next untap step.

Icy Blast tracks the creature, but not its controller. If the creature changes controllers before its first controller’s next untap step has come around, then it won’t untap during its new controller’s next untap step.

Some ferocious abilities that appear on instants and sorceries use the word “instead.” These spells have an upgraded effect if you control a creature with power 4 or greater as they resolve. For these, you only get the upgraded effect, not both effects.
Ferocious abilities of instants and sorceries that don’t use the word “instead” will provide an additional effect if you control a creature with power 4 or greater as they resolve.

cards.name: Kheru Spellsnatcher
cards.text:
Morph {4}{U}{U} (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.)
When Kheru Spellsnatcher is turned face up, counter target spell. If that spell is countered this way, exile it instead of putting it into its owner's graveyard. You may cast that card without paying its mana cost for as long as it remains exiled.

rulings.text: You can target a spell you control with Kheru Spellsnatcher’s triggered ability. This will give you the ability to cast the card later without paying its mana cost.

Because you’re already casting the card using an alternative cost (by casting it without paying its mana cost), you can’t pay any other alternative costs for the card, including casting it face down using the morph ability. You can pay additional costs, such as kicker costs. If the card has any mandatory additional costs, you must pay those.
If the card has {X} in its mana cost, you must choose 0 as the value for X when casting it.
Morph lets you cast a card face down by paying {3}, and lets you turn the face-down permanent face up any time you have priority by paying its morph cost.

The face-down spell has no mana cost and has a converted mana cost of 0. When you cast a face-down spell, put it on the stack face down so no other player knows what it is, and pay {3}. This is an alternative cost.

When the spell resolves, it enters the battlefield as a 2/2 creature with no name, mana cost, creature types, or abilities. It’s colorless and has a converted mana cost of 0. Other effects that apply to the creature can still grant it any of these characteristics.

Any time you have priority, you may turn the face-down creature face up by revealing what its morph cost is and paying that cost. This is a special action. It doesn’t use the stack and can’t be responded to. Only a face-down permanent can be turned face up this way; a face-down spell cannot.
Because the permanent is on the battlefield both before and after it’s turned face up, turning a permanent face up doesn’t cause any enters-the-battlefield abilities to trigger.

A permanent that turns face up or face down changes characteristics but is otherwise the same permanent. Spells and abilities that were targeting that permanent, as well as Auras and Equipment that were attached to the permanent, aren’t affected.
At any time, you can look at a face-down spell or permanent you control. You can’t look at face-down spells or permanents you don’t control unless an effect instructs you to do so.

You must ensure that your face-down spells and permanents can easily be differentiated from each other. You’re not allowed to mix up the cards that represent them on the battlefield in order to confuse other players. The order they entered the battlefield should remain clear. Common methods for doing this include using markers or dice, or simply placing them in order on the battlefield.
If a face-down permanent leaves the battlefield, you must reveal it. You must also reveal all face-down spells and permanents you control if you leave the game or if the game ends.

cards.name: Set Adrift
cards.text:
Delve (Each card you exile from your graveyard while casting this spell pays for {1}.)
Put target nonland permanent on top of its owner's library.
cards.flavor: The envoy spoke, and Sidisi replied.

rulings.text: The rules for delve have changed slightly since it was last in an expansion. Previously, delve reduced the cost to cast a spell. Under the current rules, you exile cards from your graveyard at the same time you pay the spell’s cost. Exiling a card this way is simply another way to pay that cost.
Delve doesn’t change a spell’s mana cost or converted mana cost. For example, Dead Drop’s converted mana cost is 10 even if you exiled three cards to cast it.
You can’t exile cards to pay for the colored mana requirements of a spell with delve.
You can’t exile more cards than the generic mana requirement of a spell with delve. For example, you can’t exile more than nine cards from your graveyard to cast Dead Drop.
Because delve isn’t an alternative cost, it can be used in conjunction with alternative costs.

foreignNames.name: 鐘音の一撃
foreignNames.text:
エンチャント（クリーチャー）
鐘音の一撃が戦場に出たとき、エンチャントされているクリーチャーをタップする。
エンチャントされているクリーチャーは、それのコントローラーのアンタップ・ステップにアンタップしない。
エンチャントされているクリーチャーは「{6}：このクリーチャーをアンタップする。」を持つ。
foreignNames.type: エンチャント — オーラ

foreignNames.name: 종울리기 공격
foreignNames.text:
생물에게 부여
종울리기 공격이 전장에 들어올 때, 부여된 생물을 탭한다.
부여된 생물은 조종자의 언탭단에 언탭되지 않는다.
부여된 생물은 "{6}: 이 생물을 언탭한다."를 가진다.

foreignNames.name: Golpe do Sino Cantante
foreignNames.text:
Encantar criatura
Quando Golpe do Sino Cantante entrar no campo de batalha, vire a criatura encantada.
A criatura encantada não é desvirada durante a etapa de desvirar de seu controlador.
A criatura encantada tem "{6}: Desvire esta criatura."

foreignNames.name: Удар Поющего Колокола
foreignNames.text:
Зачаровать существо
Когда Удар Поющего Колокола выходит на поле битвы, поверните зачарованное существо.
Зачарованное существо не разворачивается во время шага разворота контролирующего его игрока.
Зачарованное существо имеет способность «{6}: разверните это существо».

foreignNames.name: 荡钟击
foreignNames.text:
结附于生物
当荡钟击进战场时，横置所结附的生物。
所结附的生物于其操控者的重置步骤中不能重置。
所结附的生物具有「{6}：重置此生物。」

foreignNames.name: 盪鐘擊
foreignNames.text:
結附於生物
當盪鐘擊進戰場時，橫置所結附的生物。
所結附的生物於其操控者的重置步驟中不能重置。
所結附的生物具有「{6}：重置此生物。」

cards.originalText:
Enchant creature
When Singing Bell Strike enters the battlefield, tap enchanted creature.
Enchanted creature doesn't untap during its controller's untap step.
Enchanted creature has "{6}: Untap this creature."

cards.name: Stubborn Denial
cards.text:
Counter target noncreature spell unless its controller pays {1}.
Ferocious — If you control a creature with power 4 or greater, counter that spell instead.
cards.flavor: The Temur have no patience for subtlety.

rulings.text: Some ferocious abilities that appear on instants and sorceries use the word “instead.” These spells have an upgraded effect if you control a creature with power 4 or greater as they resolve. For these, you only get the upgraded effect, not both effects.
Ferocious abilities of instants and sorceries that don’t use the word “instead” will provide an additional effect if you control a creature with power 4 or greater as they resolve.

foreignNames.name: Hartnäckige Ablehnung
foreignNames.text:
Neutralisiere einen Nichtkreatur-Zauberspruch deiner Wahl, falls sein Beherrscher nicht {1} bezahlt.
Wildheit — Falls du eine Kreatur mit Stärke 4 oder mehr kontrollierst, neutralisiere stattdessen diesen Zauberspruch.
foreignNames.flavor: Die Temur haben keine Geduld für Finesse.

foreignNames.name: Negación terca
foreignNames.text:
Contrarresta el hechizo objetivo que no sea de criatura a menos que su controlador pague {1}.
Ferocidad — Si controlas una criatura con fuerza de 4 o más, en vez de eso, contrarresta ese hechizo.
foreignNames.flavor: Los Temur no tienen paciencia con las sutilezas.

foreignNames.name: Déni obstiné
foreignNames.text:
Contrecarrez un sort non-créature ciblé à moins que son contrôleur ne paie {1}.
Férocité — Si vous contrôlez une créature avec une force supérieure ou égale à 4, contrecarrez ce sort à la place.
foreignNames.flavor: Les Temur n'ont que faire de la subtilité.

foreignNames.name: Negazione Ostinata
foreignNames.text:
Neutralizza una magia non creatura bersaglio a meno che il suo controllore non paghi {1}.
Ferocia — Se controlli una creatura con forza pari o superiore a 4, invece neutralizza quella magia.
foreignNames.flavor: I Temur non perdono tempo in sottigliezze.

foreignNames.name: 頑固な否認
foreignNames.text:
クリーチャーでない呪文１つを対象とする。それのコントローラーが{1}を支払わないかぎり、それを打ち消す。
獰猛 ― あなたがパワーが４以上のクリーチャーをコントロールしているなら、代わりにその呪文を打ち消す。
foreignNames.flavor: 細かいことに構っていられるほどティムールは悠長ではない。

foreignNames.name: 고집스러운 부정
foreignNames.text:
생물이 아닌 주문을 목표로 정한다. 그 주문의 조종자가 {1}을 지불하지 않으면 그 주문을 무효화한다.
흉포 — 당신이 공격력이 4 이상인 생물을 조종한다면, 대신에 그 주문을 무효화한다.
foreignNames.flavor: 테무르인들은 미묘한 것을 참지 못한다.

foreignNames.name: Negação Persistente
foreignNames.text:
Anule a mágica alvo que não seja de criatura, a menos que seu controlador pague {1}.
Feroz — Se você controla uma criatura com poder igual ou superior a 4, em vez disso, anule aquela mágica.
foreignNames.flavor: Os Temur não têm paciência para sutilezas.

foreignNames.name: Упрямое Отрицание
foreignNames.text:
Отмените целевое не являющееся существом заклинание, если только контролирующий его игрок не заплатит {1}.
Свирепость — Если вы контролируете существо с силой не менее 4, вместо этого отмените то заклинание.
foreignNames.flavor: Темуры не терпят экивоков.

foreignNames.name: 顽固拒斥
foreignNames.text:
除非目标非生物咒语的操控者支付{1}，否则反击之。
威猛～如果你操控力量等于或大于4的生物，则改为反击该咒语。
foreignNames.flavor: 铁木尔没有耐心讲究细节。

foreignNames.name: 頑固拒斥
foreignNames.text:
除非目標非生物咒語的操控者支付{1}，否則反擊之。
威猛～如果你操控力量等於或大於4的生物，則改為反擊該咒語。
foreignNames.flavor: 鐵木爾沒有耐心講究細節。

cards.originalText:
Counter target noncreature spell unless its controller pays {1}.
Ferocious — If you control a creature with power 4 or greater, counter that spell instead.

cards.name: Taigam's Scheming
cards.text: Surveil 5. (Look at the top five cards of your library, then put any number of them into your graveyard and the rest on top of your library in any order.)
cards.flavor: "The Jeskai would have me bow in restraint. So I have found a people unafraid of true power."

foreignNames.name: Taigams Ränkespiel
foreignNames.text: Schaue dir die obersten fünf Karten deiner Bibliothek an. Lege eine beliebige Anzahl davon auf deinen Friedhof und den Rest in beliebiger Reihenfolge oben auf deine Bibliothek.
foreignNames.flavor: „Die Jeskai wollen, dass ich gesenkten Hauptes Zurückhaltung übe. Also habe ich mir ein Volk gesucht, das keine Angst vor wahrer Macht hat."

foreignNames.name: Maquinación de Taigam
foreignNames.text: Mira las cinco primeras cartas de tu biblioteca. Pon cualquier cantidad de ellas en tu cementerio y el resto en la parte superior de tu biblioteca en cualquier orden.
foreignNames.flavor: "Los Jeskai querrían verme arrodillado y sometido. Veo que he hallado a un pueblo que no teme el auténtico poder".

foreignNames.name: Machinations de Taigam
foreignNames.text: Regardez les cinq cartes du dessus de votre bibliothèque. Mettez n'importe quel nombre d'entre elles dans votre cimetière et remettez ensuite le reste au-dessus de votre bibliothèque, dans l'ordre de votre choix.
foreignNames.flavor: « Les Jeskaï m'auraient emprisonné et contraint à me prosterner. Alors j'ai trouvé un peuple qui n'a pas peur de la vraie puissance. »

foreignNames.name: Intrighi di Taigam
foreignNames.text: Guarda le prime cinque carte del tuo grimorio. Mettine un qualsiasi numero nel tuo cimitero e le altre in cima al tuo grimorio in qualsiasi ordine.
foreignNames.flavor: "I Jeskai vorrebbero che mi piegassi alla moderazione, così ho trovato un popolo che non teme il vero potere."

foreignNames.name: テイガムの策謀
foreignNames.text: あなたのライブラリーの一番上から５枚のカードを見る。そのうちの望む枚数をあなたの墓地に置き、残りをあなたのライブラリーの一番上に望む順番で置く。
foreignNames.flavor: 「ジェスカイの奴らは私に抑制を教えるために頭を下げさせた。だから、真の力を恐れない者たちを私は探し当てたのさ。」

foreignNames.name: 타이감의 술책
foreignNames.text: 당신의 서고 맨 위의 카드 다섯 장을 본다. 그중 원하는 만큼을 당신의 무덤에 넣고 나머지 카드들은 당신의 서고 맨 위에 원하는 순서로 놓는다.
foreignNames.flavor: "제스카이는 나로 하여금 억압된 채로 머리를 숙이게 할 것이야. 그래서 나는 진정한 힘을 두려워하지 않는 이들을 찾았지."

foreignNames.name: Maquinações de Taigam
foreignNames.text: Olhe os cinco cards do topo de seu grimório. Coloque qualquer quantidade deles no seu cemitério e o restante no topo do seu grimório em qualquer ordem.
foreignNames.flavor: "Os Jeskai queriam que eu me curvasse em respeito. Então, encontrei um povo que não temesse o poder verdadeiro."

foreignNames.name: Замыслы Тайгама
foreignNames.text: Посмотрите пять верхних карт вашей библиотеки. Положите любое количество из них на ваше кладбище, а остальные обратно на верх вашей библиотеки в любом порядке.
foreignNames.flavor: «У джескайцев мне бы пришлось согнуться в смиренном поклоне. Так что я отыскал народ, который не боится истинного могущества».

foreignNames.name: 泰伽姆的阴谋
foreignNames.text: 检视你牌库顶的五张牌。将其中任意数量的牌置入你的坟墓场，其余则以任意顺序放回你的牌库顶。
foreignNames.flavor: 「洁斯凯还想迫使我屈服，既然他们毫不畏惧，就让他们瞧瞧真正的力量。」

foreignNames.name: 泰伽姆的陰謀
foreignNames.text: 檢視你牌庫頂的五張牌。將其中任意數量的牌置入你的墳墓場，其餘則以任意順序放回你的牌庫頂。
foreignNames.flavor: 「潔斯凱還想迫使我屈服，既然他們毫不畏懼，就讓他們瞧瞧真正的力量。」

cards.originalText: Look at the top five cards of your library. Put any number of them into your graveyard and the rest back on top of your library in any order.

cards.name: Thousand Winds
cards.text:
Flying
Morph {5}{U}{U} (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.)
When Thousand Winds is turned face up, return all other tapped creatures to their owners' hands.

rulings.text: It doesn’t matter if Thousand Winds is tapped or untapped (or even on the battlefield) when its last ability resolves. Tapped creatures except Thousand Winds will be returned to their owners’ hands.
Morph lets you cast a card face down by paying {3}, and lets you turn the face-down permanent face up any time you have priority by paying its morph cost.

The face-down spell has no mana cost and has a converted mana cost of 0. When you cast a face-down spell, put it on the stack face down so no other player knows what it is, and pay {3}. This is an alternative cost.

When the spell resolves, it enters the battlefield as a 2/2 creature with no name, mana cost, creature types, or abilities. It’s colorless and has a converted mana cost of 0. Other effects that apply to the creature can still grant it any of these characteristics.

Any time you have priority, you may turn the face-down creature face up by revealing what its morph cost is and paying that cost. This is a special action. It doesn’t use the stack and can’t be responded to. Only a face-down permanent can be turned face up this way; a face-down spell cannot.
Because the permanent is on the battlefield both before and after it’s turned face up, turning a permanent face up doesn’t cause any enters-the-battlefield abilities to trigger.

A permanent that turns face up or face down changes characteristics but is otherwise the same permanent. Spells and abilities that were targeting that permanent, as well as Auras and Equipment that were attached to the permanent, aren’t affected.
At any time, you can look at a face-down spell or permanent you control. You can’t look at face-down spells or permanents you don’t control unless an effect instructs you to do so.

You must ensure that your face-down spells and permanents can easily be differentiated from each other. You’re not allowed to mix up the cards that represent them on the battlefield in order to confuse other players. The order they entered the battlefield should remain clear. Common methods for doing this include using markers or dice, or simply placing them in order on the battlefield.
If a face-down permanent leaves the battlefield, you must reveal it. You must also reveal all face-down spells and permanents you control if you leave the game or if the game ends.

foreignNames.name: Tausend Winde
foreignNames.text:
Fliegend
Morph {5}{U}{U} (Du kannst diese Karte verdeckt für {3} als eine 2/2 Kreatur wirken. Decke sie zu einem beliebigen Zeitpunkt für ihre Morph-Kosten auf.)
Wenn Tausend Winde aufgedeckt wird, bringe alle anderen getappten Kreaturen auf die Hand ihrer Besitzer zurück.

foreignNames.name: Mil vientos
foreignNames.text:
Vuela.
Metamorfosis {5}{U}{U}. (Puedes lanzar esta carta boca abajo como una criatura 2/2 pagando {3}. Ponla boca arriba en cualquier momento pagando su coste de metamorfosis.)
Cuando el Mil vientos se ponga boca arriba, regresa todas las otras criaturas giradas a las manos de sus propietarios.

foreignNames.name: Mille vents
foreignNames.text:
Vol
Mue {5}{U}{U} (Vous pouvez lancer cette carte face cachée comme une créature 2/2 pour {3}. Retournez-la à tout moment pour son coût de mue.)
Quand les Mille vents sont retournés face visible, renvoyez toutes les autres créatures engagées dans les mains de leurs propriétaires.

foreignNames.name: Mille Venti
foreignNames.text:
Volare
Metamorfosi {5}{U}{U} (Puoi lanciare questa carta a faccia in giù come una creatura 2/2 pagando {3}. Girala a faccia in su in qualsiasi momento pagando il suo costo di metamorfosi.)
Quando il Mille Venti viene girato a faccia in su, fai tornare tutte le altre creature TAPpate in mano ai rispettivi proprietari.

foreignNames.name: 千の風
foreignNames.text:
飛行
変異{5}{U}{U}（あなたはこのカードを、{3}で２/２クリーチャーとして裏向きに唱えてもよい。これの変異コストで、これをいつでも表向きにしてよい。）
千の風が表向きになったとき、他のタップ状態のクリーチャーをすべてオーナーの手札に戻す。
foreignNames.type: クリーチャー — エレメンタル

foreignNames.name: 천 개의 바람
foreignNames.text:
비행
변이 {5}{U}{U} (당신은 {3}을 지불해서 이 카드를 뒷면 상태의 2/2 생물로 발동할 수 있다. 언제든지 변이 비용을 지불하고 앞면이 보이도록 뒤집을 수 있다.)
천 개의 바람이 앞면으로 뒤집히면, 다른 모든 탭된 생물들을 소유자의 손으로 되돌린다.

foreignNames.name: Mil Ventos
foreignNames.text:
Voar
Metamorfose {5}{U}{U} (Você pode conjurar este card com a face voltada para baixo como uma criatura 2/2 por {3}. Volte sua face para cima a qualquer momento pagando seu custo de metamorfose.)
Quando Mil Ventos for voltado para cima, devolva todas as outras criaturas viradas para as mãos de seus donos.

foreignNames.name: Тысяча Ветров
foreignNames.text:
Полет
Оборотень {5}{U}{U} (Вы можете разыграть эту карту рубашкой вверх как существо 2/2 за {3}. Переверните ее рубашкой вниз в любой момент за ее стоимость Оборотня.)
Когда Тысяча Ветров переворачивается рубашкой вниз, верните все другие повернутые существа в руки их владельцев.

foreignNames.name: 千风灵
foreignNames.text:
飞行
变身{5}{U}{U}（你可牌面朝下地施放此牌并支付{3}，将其当成2/2生物。可随时支付其变身费用使其翻回正面。）
当千风灵翻回正面时，将所有其他已横置的生物移回其拥有者手上。

foreignNames.name: 千風靈
foreignNames.text:
飛行
變身{5}{U}{U}（你可牌面朝下地施放此牌並支付{3}，將其當成2/2生物。可隨時支付其變身費用使其翻回正面。）
當千風靈翻回正面時，將所有其他已橫置的生物移回其擁有者手上。

cards.originalText:
Flying
Morph {5}{U}{U} (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.)
When Thousand Winds is turned face up, return all other tapped creatures to their owners' hands.

cards.name: Treasure Cruise
cards.text:
Delve (Each card you exile from your graveyard while casting this spell pays for {1}.)
Draw three cards.
cards.flavor: Countless delights drift on the surface while dark schemes run below.

rulings.text: Delve doesn't change a spell's mana cost or mana value. For example, Treasure Cruise's mana value is 8 even if you exiled three cards to cast it.

You can exile cards to pay only for generic mana, and you can't exile more cards than the generic mana requirement of a spell with delve. For example, you can't exile more than seven cards from your graveyard to cast Treasure Cruise unless an effect has increased its cost.
Because delve isn't an alternative cost, it can be used in conjunction with alternative costs, such as flashback. It can also be used to pay for additional costs that include generic mana.

foreignNames.name: Lohnende Ausfahrt
foreignNames.text:
Wühlen (Mit jeder Karte, die du aus deinem Friedhof ins Exil schickst, während du diesen Zauberspruch wirkst, bezahlst du {1} seiner Kosten.)
Ziehe drei Karten.
foreignNames.flavor: Zahllose Freuden treiben auf der Oberfläche, doch darunter strömen dunkle Machenschaften.

foreignNames.name: Crucero del tesoro
foreignNames.text:
Excavar. (Cada carta que exilies de tu cementerio al lanzar este hechizo cuenta como un pago de {1}.)
Roba tres cartas.
foreignNames.flavor: Incontables maravillas flotan en la superficie; mientras, en las profundidades se urden oscuras maquinaciones.

foreignNames.name: Fortune des mers
foreignNames.text:
Fouille (Chaque carte que vous exilez depuis votre cimetière en lançant ce sort paie {1}.)
Piochez trois cartes.
foreignNames.flavor: Tandis que d'innombrables délices dérivent à la surface, de sombres machinations se cachent dans les profondeurs.

foreignNames.name: Traversata Sfarzosa
foreignNames.text:
Esumare (Ogni carta che esili dal tuo cimitero mentre lanci questa magia corrisponde al pagamento di {1}.)
Pesca tre carte.
foreignNames.flavor: Infinite delizie scivolano in superficie, sopra correnti profonde di oscuri intrighi.

foreignNames.name: 宝船の巡航
foreignNames.text:
探査（この呪文を唱える段階であなたがあなたの墓地から追放した各カードは、{1}を支払う。）ｆ
カードを３枚引く。
foreignNames.flavor: 無数の歓楽が水面上に浮かぶ間も、暗き陰謀が水面下で展開されている。

foreignNames.name: 보물선 선상여행
foreignNames.text:
파헤치기 (이 주문을 발동하는 동안 당신이 당신의 무덤에서 추방하는 카드는 {1}을 지불한다.)
카드 세 장을 뽑는다.
foreignNames.flavor: 셀 수 없이 많은 보화가 수면 위를 표류하고 있지만, 그 아래엔 음모가 도사리고 있다.

foreignNames.name: Cruzeiro do Tesouro
foreignNames.text:
Esquadrinhar (Cada card que você exila de seu cemitério quando conjura esta mágica paga por {1}.)
Compre três cards.
foreignNames.flavor: Incontáveis prazeres flutuam na superfície enquanto planos malignos correm por baixo.

foreignNames.name: Плаванье за Сокровищами
foreignNames.text:
Выкапывание (Каждая карта, которую вы изгоняете из вашего кладбища при разыгрывании этого заклинания, считается оплатой {1}.)
Возьмите три карты.
foreignNames.flavor: Бесчисленные удовольствия манят своим видом, но в глубинах творятся черные замыслы.

foreignNames.name: 宝船巡游
foreignNames.text:
掘穴（你于施放此咒语时每从你坟墓场中放逐一张牌，就能为此咒语支付{1}）。
抓三张牌。
foreignNames.flavor: 金玉漂流在外，阴谋勾画其间。

foreignNames.name: 寶船巡遊
foreignNames.text:
掘穴（你於施放此咒語時每從你墳墓場中放逐一張牌，就能為此咒語支付{1}）。
抽三張牌。
foreignNames.flavor: 金玉漂流在外，陰謀勾畫其間。

cards.originalText:
Delve (Each card you exile from your graveyard while casting this spell pays for {1}.)
Draw three cards.

cards.name: Waterwhirl
cards.text: Return up to two target creatures to their owners' hands.
cards.flavor:
"Be as water: untamed and unheld, yet inexorably flowing toward a greater goal."
—Shensu, Riverwheel mystic

foreignNames.name: Wasserstrudel
foreignNames.text: Bringe bis zu zwei Kreaturen deiner Wahl auf die Hand ihrer Besitzer zurück.
foreignNames.flavor: „Sei wie Wasser: ungezähmt und frei und doch unaufhaltsam auf das größere Ziel zufließend." —Shensu, Mystiker der Flussradfeste

foreignNames.name: Remolino hídrico
foreignNames.text: Regresa hasta dos criaturas objetivo a las manos de sus propietarios.
foreignNames.flavor: "Sé como el agua: indomable e incontenible, pero sin dejar de fluir inexorablemente hacia una meta superior". —Shensu, místico de Rueda del Río

foreignNames.name: Déferlante marine
foreignNames.text: Renvoyez jusqu'à deux créatures ciblées dans les mains de leurs propriétaires.
foreignNames.flavor: « Soyez comme l'eau : libre et sauvage, mais inéluctablement porté vers une destinée supérieure. » —Shensu, mystique de Noria

foreignNames.name: Idrovortice
foreignNames.text: Fai tornare fino a due creature bersaglio in mano ai rispettivi proprietari.
foreignNames.flavor: "Sii come l'acqua: indomito e senza vincoli, ma in continuo e inesorabile fluire verso una meta suprema." —Shensu, mistico di Rivo delle Ruote

foreignNames.name: 水渦
foreignNames.text: クリーチャーを最大２体まで対象とし、それらをオーナーの手札に戻す。
foreignNames.flavor: 「水のようになれ。飼いならされず、束縛されず、それでいて大いなる海に向かって止めどなく流れ行くように。」 ――河水環の神秘家、シェンスー

foreignNames.name: 물회오리
foreignNames.text: 최대 두 개까지의 생물을 목표로 정한다. 그 생물들을 소유자의 손으로 되돌린다.
foreignNames.flavor: "흐르는 물과 같이 길들여지거나 구속되지 않고 더 위대한 목적을 향해 거침없이 흐르는 사람이 되어라." —굽이강 신비주의자 셴수

foreignNames.name: Turbilhão D'água
foreignNames.text: Devolva até duas criaturas alvo para as mãos de seus donos.
foreignNames.flavor: "Seja como a água: livre e indomado, mas sempre correndo para um objetivo maior." — Shensu, místico de Roda D'água

foreignNames.name: Водоворот
foreignNames.text: Верните не более двух целевых существ в руки их владельцев.
foreignNames.flavor: «Будь подобен воде: неукротимым, неудержимым, но без устали стремящимся к великой цели». — Шэньсу, мистик Речного Круга

foreignNames.name: 回旋急流
foreignNames.text: 将至多两个目标生物移回其拥有者手上。
foreignNames.flavor: 「正如这流水：形不羁而向高远，行无常而道恒定。」 ～河轮秘教徒申苏

foreignNames.name: 迴旋急流
foreignNames.text: 將至多兩個目標生物移回其擁有者手上。
foreignNames.flavor: 「正如這流水：形不羈而向高遠，行無常而道恆定。」 ～河輪秘教徒申蘇

cards.originalText: Return up to two target creatures to their owners' hands.

cards.name: Weave Fate
cards.text: Draw two cards.
cards.flavor: Temur shamans speak of three destinies: the now, the echo of the past, and the unwritten. They find flickering paths among tangled possibilities.

foreignNames.name: Schicksal weben
foreignNames.text: Ziehe zwei Karten.
foreignNames.flavor: Die Schamanen der Temur sprechen von drei Bestimmungen: dem Jetzt, dem Widerhall der Vergangenheit und dem Ungeschriebenen. Sie finden flimmernde Pfade inmitten verworrener Möglichkeiten.

foreignNames.name: Tejer el destino
foreignNames.text: Roba dos cartas.
foreignNames.flavor: Los chamanes temur hablan de tres destinos: el ahora, el eco del pasado y lo que está por escribir. Hallan caminos titilantes entre posibilidades enmarañadas.

foreignNames.name: Tissage du destin
foreignNames.text: Piochez deux cartes.
foreignNames.flavor: Les shamanes temuriens évoquent trois destins : le présent, l'écho du passé et l'inconnu. Ils découvrent des voies discontinues dans l'enchevêtrement des possibilités.

foreignNames.name: Tessere il Destino
foreignNames.text: Pesca due carte.
foreignNames.flavor: Gli sciamani dei Temur parlano di tre destini: il presente, l'eco del passato e ciò che non è ancora scritto. Sono in grado di trovare sentieri effimeri nell'intreccio di possibilità.

foreignNames.name: 運命編み
foreignNames.text: カードを２枚引く。
foreignNames.flavor: ティムールのシャーマンたちは３つの運命を口にする――現在、過去の残響、そして書かれざるもの。彼らは絡み合った可能性の中にちらつく道の先を見い出す。

foreignNames.name: 운명 짜기
foreignNames.text: 카드 두 장을 뽑는다.
foreignNames.flavor: 테무르 주술사들은 현재, 과거의 반복, 그리고 아직 기록되지 않은 미래라는 세 가지 운명에 대해 말한다. 그들은 뒤얽혀 있는 가능성 사이로 어른거리는 길을 밝힌다.

foreignNames.name: Tecer Destino
foreignNames.text: Compre dois cards.
foreignNames.flavor: Os xamãs Temur falam de três destinos: o agora, o eco do passado e o não escrito. Eles descobrem caminhos tremulantes dentre as possibilidades entrelaçadas.

foreignNames.name: Плетение Судьбы
foreignNames.text: Возьмите две карты.
foreignNames.flavor: Шаманы темуров говорят о трех судьбах: о происходящем, об отголосках прошлого и о ненаписанном. Они находят еле заметные тропки среди переплетений вероятностей.

foreignNames.name: 编纺命运
foreignNames.text: 抓两张牌。
foreignNames.flavor: 铁木尔祭师论及三条命途：眼下当世，过往回响，以及口耳传闻。从三者相互交织产生的无限可能之中，他们找出明灭不定的动向。

foreignNames.name: 編紡命運
foreignNames.text: 抽兩張牌。
foreignNames.flavor: 鐵木爾祭師論及三條命途：眼下當世，過往迴響，以及口耳傳聞。從三者相互交織產生的無限可能之中，他們找出明滅不定的動向。

cards.originalText: Draw two cards.

cards.name: Wetland Sambar
cards.flavor: As a test of calm and compassion, a Jeskai monk softly approaches a grazing sambar and offers it a lotus from his or her hand. If the creature eats, the student ascends to the next level of training.

foreignNames.name: Feuchtlandsambar
foreignNames.flavor: Als Prüfung in Ruhe und Mitgefühl nähert sich ein Jeskai-Mönch behutsam einem grasenden Sambar und bietet ihm einen Lotus aus seiner Hand an. Wenn die Kreatur frisst, steigt der Schüler zur nächsten Ausbildungsstufe auf.

foreignNames.name: Sambar del pantano
foreignNames.flavor: Como prueba de calma y compasión, el monje jeskai se acerca suavemente a un sambar mientras pasta y le ofrece un loto de su propia mano. Si la criatura come, el estudiante asciende al siguiente nivel de entrenamiento.

foreignNames.name: Sambar des marécages
foreignNames.flavor: Pour prouver son calme et sa compassion, un moine jeskaï doit s'approcher d'un sambar paissant et lui tendre un lotus. Si la créature le mange, l'élève peut poursuivre l'entraînement.

foreignNames.name: Sambar degli Acquitrini
foreignNames.flavor: Come prova di calma e compassione, i monaci Jeskai si avvicinano lentamente a un sambar al pascolo e gli offrono con la mano un loto. Se la creatura lo mangia, lo studente procede al livello successivo del noviziato.

foreignNames.name: 湿地帯の水鹿
foreignNames.type: クリーチャー — 大鹿
foreignNames.flavor: 冷静さと慈愛の試練として、ジェスカイの僧は草を食む水鹿に静かに近づき、その手で蓮の花を差し出す。水鹿がそれを食せば、その見習いは訓練の次の段階に進むことができる。

foreignNames.name: 습지 삼바
foreignNames.flavor: 제스카이 승려는 풀을 뜯는 삼바에게 자신의 손으로 연꽃을 내밀어 평온과 자비심을 시험받는다. 삼바가 연꽃을 먹으면 다음 수련 단계로 넘어간다.

foreignNames.name: Sâmbar do Charco
foreignNames.flavor: Como um teste de calma e compaixão, um monge Jeskai se aproxima calmamente de um sâmbar que pasta e oferece a ele uma lótus em sua mão. Se a criatura comer, o estudante ascende ao próximo nível de treinamento.

foreignNames.name: Болотный Замбар
foreignNames.flavor: В испытании спокойствия и сопереживания джескайский монах медленно подходит к пасущемуся замбару и предлагает ему лотос из своих рук. Если зверь съедает цветок, ученик переходит на новую ступень обучения.

foreignNames.name: 湿地水鹿
foreignNames.flavor: 洁斯凯测试僧徒是否已静心向善，便是派他手持莲花蹑脚步至食草水鹿跟前喂食。如果水鹿吃下了莲花，这名僧徒就能接受下一阶段的训练。

foreignNames.name: 濕地水鹿
foreignNames.flavor: 潔斯凱測試僧徒是否已靜心向善，便是派他手持蓮花躡腳步至食草水鹿跟前餵食。如果水鹿吃下了蓮花，這名僧徒就能接受下一階段的訓練。

cards.name: Whirlwind Adept
cards.text:
Hexproof (This creature can't be the target of spells or abilities your opponents control.)
Prowess (Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, this creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.)

rulings.text: Any spell you cast that doesn’t have the type creature will cause prowess to trigger. If a spell has multiple types, and one of those types is creature (such as an artifact creature), casting it won’t cause prowess to trigger. Playing a land also won’t cause prowess to trigger.
Prowess goes on the stack on top of the spell that caused it to trigger. It will resolve before that spell.
Once it triggers, prowess isn’t connected to the spell that caused it to trigger. If that spell is countered, prowess will still resolve.

foreignNames.name: Eingeweihte des Wirbelwinds
foreignNames.text:
Fluchsicher (Diese Kreatur kann nicht das Ziel von Zaubersprüchen oder Fähigkeiten sein, die deine Gegner kontrollieren.)

방호 (이 생물은 당신의 상대들이 조종하는 주문이나 능력의 목표로 정해질 수 없다.)

foreignNames.name: Адепт Вихря

Порчеустойчивость (Это существо не может быть целью заклинаний или способностей под контролем ваших оппонентов.)
Искусность (Каждый раз, когда вы разыгрываете не являющееся существом заклинание, это существо получает +1/+1 до конца хода.)

辟邪（此生物不能成为由对手所操控之咒语或异能的目标。）

cards.originalText:
Hexproof (This creature can't be the target of spells or abilities your opponents control.)

cards.name: Bellowing Saddlebrute
cards.text: Raid — When Bellowing Saddlebrute enters the battlefield, you lose 4 life unless you attacked this turn.

rulings.text: Raid abilities care only that you attacked with a creature. It doesn’t matter how many creatures you attacked with, or which opponent or planeswalker controlled by an opponent those creatures attacked.

Raid abilities evaluate the entire turn to see if you attacked with a creature. That creature doesn’t have to still be on the battlefield. Similarly, the player or planeswalker it attacked doesn’t have to still be in the game or on the battlefield, respectively.

foreignNames.name: Brüllender Sattelrohling
foreignNames.text: Überfall — Wenn der Brüllende Sattelrohling ins Spiel kommt, verlierst du 4 Lebenspunkte, falls du in diesem Zug nicht mit mindestens einer Kreatur angegriffen hast.

foreignNames.name: Jinete brutal bramadora
foreignNames.text: Incursión — Cuando la Jinete brutal bramadora entre al campo de batalla, pierdes 4 vidas a menos que hayas atacado con una criatura este turno.

foreignNames.name: Brute hussarde beuglarde
foreignNames.text: Saccage — Quand la Brute hussarde beuglarde arrive sur le champ de bataille, vous perdez 4 points de vie à moins que vous n'ayez attaqué avec une créature ce tour-ci.

foreignNames.text: Incursione — Quando la Cavaliera Bestiale Urlante entra nel campo di battaglia, perdi 4 punti vita a meno che tu non abbia attaccato con una creatura in questo turno.

foreignNames.text: 強襲 ― 吠える鞍暴れが戦場に出たとき、このターンにあなたがクリーチャーで攻撃していないかぎり、あなたは４点のライフを失う。
